title: Welcome to Fibulopedia!
content: Fibulopedia is now live! Explore our comprehensive guide to the Fibula Project - a faithful recreation of classic Tibia 7.1.
author: Admin

title: New Weapons Database Added
content: We've added a complete database of all weapons available in Fibula Project. Check out stats, comparisons, and drop locations!
author: Admin

title: Server Rates Information
content: Visit our Server Info page to learn about exp rates, loot rates, and unique features of Fibula Project.
author: Admin
